NOAA Satellite Course: Introduction to ERDDAP Cara Wilson and Dale Robinson 16 May 2019 Preface These exercises are materials for the NOAA Satellite Training Course offered each year by regional nodes of NOAA’s CoastWatch program. They demonstrate the features of the ERDDAP data servers and hands-on training on how to use the feature. Participants will subset and download data, create mapped images, visualize wind vector fields, and generate timeseries and Hovmöller diagrams. Suggested software includes a text editor like Notepad or TextEdit and the netCDF file viewer Panoply (www.giss.nasa.gov/tools/panoply/).
